snippet.title: Death Mark Trailer - Spirits
snippet.description:
A strange rumor is spreading in Tokyo’s H city - those who possess the Mark will die. Unexpectedly appearing on the body, like a grotesque birthmark, those who bear the Mark will die from unknown causes.

Deprived of your memories, you arrive at a mansion rumored to protect the bearers of the Mark. As the doors swing open, the countdown to death has already begun...
